A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i went to watch the last jedi excited.  walked out disappointed.  make no mistake\, the movie was made great.  but the story\, i didn't like it.  it didn't feel like it was a star wars story.  i didn't like that snoke's story wasn't expounded.  and worst\, i didn't like what they did to luke.  so i guess\, i prefer force awakens than this one.  at least that movie felt like a star wars movie.
